ordercallsection.sectionName: We will find the best solution
ordercallsection.heading: Contact us

notification.sentSuccessfully: Successfull, we will contact you soon!

cta.heading: Preparing for a vacation with us is very easy! Millions of trips to 80 countries - in a convenient search engine!
cta.motto: Take legendary tours with AFSONA TOUR

tourlist.text1: Prepare for a vacation with us - millions of trips to 80 countries are available in a convenient search engine. Easily find the right type, pay in minutes. And our super service means you don't have to worry about anything while on vacation.
tourlist.text2: Want to get your feelings back? Then you should travel with us! We know what you need, we know what places you will visit and be amazed.

aboutus.heading: About our company
aboutus.headingtext: Travel to any country with "AFSONA TOUR" and win prizes and excursions through our bonus system. We are happy to serve you
aboutus.pricingpolicycontent: With AFSONA TOUR, you can travel around the world at the most affordable prices, paying in installments and even for free.
aboutus.alldayworkcontent: Order a call at any time, we will contact you shortly

AboutPage.title: About our company
AboutPage.text1: Hello, Thank you for choosing AFSONA TOUR.
AboutPage.text2: With AFSONA TOUR, you can travel around the world at the most affordable prices, paying in installments and even for free.
AboutPage.text3: Every month we give away gifts for our most active followers on our social networks.
AboutPage.text4: In addition, you can get bonuses for your next trip by telling your friends about your trip with AFSONA TOUR.

RegisterPage.title: Registration
RegisterPage.message: You will be able to register soon!
RegisterPage.redirectmsg: - Visit page to contact with us
